trans-unit.source: Assign users to a custom domain in Azure Active Directory | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Assign users to a custom domain in Azure Active Directory | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: How to populate a custom domain in Azure Active Directory with user accounts.
trans-unit.target: How to populate a custom domain in Azure Active Directory with user accounts.

trans-unit.source: Assign users to a custom domain
trans-unit.target: Assign users to a custom domain

trans-unit.source: After you have added your custom domain to Azure Active Directory, you must add the user accounts for this domain so that you can begin authenticating them.
trans-unit.target: After you have added your custom domain to Azure Active Directory, you must add the user accounts for this domain so that you can begin authenticating them.

trans-unit.source: Users synced in from a directory on your corporate network
trans-unit.target: Users synced in from a directory on your corporate network

trans-unit.source: If you have already set up a connection between your on-premises Active Directory and Azure Active Directory, synchronization can populate the accounts.
trans-unit.target: If you have already set up a connection between your on-premises Active Directory and Azure Active Directory, synchronization can populate the accounts.

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to synchronize Azure Active Directory with your on-premises Active Directory, see [Integrating your on-premises identities with Azure Active Directory](active-directory-aadconnect.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information on how to synchronize Azure Active Directory with your on-premises Active Directory, see [Integrating your on-premises identities with Azure Active Directory](active-directory-aadconnect.md).

trans-unit.source: Users added and managed in the cloud
trans-unit.target: Users added and managed in the cloud

trans-unit.source: To change the domain for an existing user account:
trans-unit.target: To change the domain for an existing user account:

trans-unit.source: Open the Azure classic portal using an account that is a global admin or a user admin.
trans-unit.target: Open the Azure classic portal using an account that is a global admin or a user admin.

trans-unit.source: Open your directory.
trans-unit.target: Open your directory.

trans-unit.source: Select the **Users** tab.
trans-unit.target: Select the **Users** tab.

trans-unit.source: Select the user from the list.
trans-unit.target: Select the user from the list.

trans-unit.source: Change the domain for the user, and then select **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Change the domain for the user, and then select **Save**.

trans-unit.source: This can also be done using [Microsoft PowerShell](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/e1ef403f-3347-4409-8f46-d72dafa116e0#BKMK_ManageDomains) or the [Graph API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/Library/Azure/Ad/Graph/api/domains-operations).
trans-unit.target: This can also be done using [Microsoft PowerShell](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/e1ef403f-3347-4409-8f46-d72dafa116e0#BKMK_ManageDomains) or the [Graph API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/Library/Azure/Ad/Graph/api/domains-operations).

trans-unit.source: Select a custom domain when creating a new user
trans-unit.target: Select a custom domain when creating a new user

trans-unit.source: Open the Azure classic portal using an account that is a global admin or a user admin.
trans-unit.target: Open the Azure classic portal using an account that is a global admin or a user admin.

trans-unit.source: Open your directory.
trans-unit.target: Open your directory.

trans-unit.source: Select the **Users** tab.
trans-unit.target: Select the **Users** tab.

trans-unit.source: In the command bar, select **Add**.
trans-unit.target: In the command bar, select **Add**.

trans-unit.source: When you add the user name, choose the custom domain from the domain list.
trans-unit.target: When you add the user name, choose the custom domain from the domain list.

trans-unit.source: Select **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Select **Save**.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.target: Using custom domain names to simplify the sign-in experience for your users

trans-unit.target: Add company branding to your Sign In and Access Panel pages

trans-unit.target: Add and verify a custom domain name in Azure Active Directory

trans-unit.target: Change the DNS registrar for your custom domain name

trans-unit.target: Delete a custom domain in Azure Active Directory
